localInspection.displayName: Trying to call a non-callable object
Assigning function call that doesn't return anything
Global variable is undefined at the module level
Access to a protected member of a class
Class must implement all abstract methods

action.description: Allows to quickly run Python console
Opens debug command line for running process
Executes selected code fragment in Python/Django console
Create a new directory and __init__.py inside it
Delete compiled bytecode files in selected directory and its subdirectories
